The blush compact was also a lot smaller than what i expected, especially for what I paid for it. I have not done a wear test yet, so I cannot comment on that.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: Amazing blush and color for fair complexions!
review_content:
This is the blush I’ve been searching for my entire life - it creates a very flattering color that also somehow looks completely natural. I have fair skin and very high cheekbones, so it doesn’t take much for blush to look weird or garish on me. In the past, I have had to settle for colors that basically don’t show up much on me (Benefit’s Dandelion for example) or just stick with bronzer. This is the first time I can add real color and have it look really good. It also has the added benefit of making my eyes look bluer! I don’t know what it is about this blush that is so different from the others, but I’m glad I found it. I’d highly recommend it for anyone with a fair complexion!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Super Pale? You will LOVE this blush!
review_content:
I have super pale, cool-toned skin. I look a lot like the Irish side of my family with dark hair and skin so pale I practically glow in the dark - I wear N0 in the Cover FX foundation. I also just recently started wearing foundation, and when you wear foundation, that pretty natural flush us super pale girls get on our cheeks for no reason at all or just being outside in the cold or sun doesn't come through the foundation, and was really hard to replicate with any color blush, but this Strawberry matte blush comes pretty close to my fresh and natural looking flushed skin. It is really easy for blush to look clownish on pale skin, and this blush looks sort of dark in the pan, so I never would have picked it for my skin tone it if I hadn't seen it on a review on you tube - so glad I did because it's so pretty! So, if you're pale and looking for a good blush, definitely try this one!

review_title: Perfect blush for a natural look!
review_content: Amazing amazing blush! Super natural looking. Perfect for office wear!

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Beautiful color but not enough pigmentation
review_content: I love Laura Mercier products but I'm a little disappointed with this blush. It's a beautiful color, but I need to apply a lot for it to show. I wish they had a more pigmented blush in this color.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: The color is very nice and subtle: I gave 4 stars for not having a mini brush for travel. Overall I like the color. I bought in color Nude. It stays on but not for many hours. Just average stay power in my opinion.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This was my first and last time purchasing this product. There is a TON of fallout especially for a matte (I purchased the color Chai). I have to clean off the outside of my compact each time I use it. It does look a bit faded by the end of the day. It does not perform like a high end product.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: powdery, no shimmer, I want to keep a low-key, but looks naturally great, then this is what you are looking for.

user_specs: ['Age 13-17', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: No pigment whatsoever when I tried it. I could barely get it to swatch on my hand, let alone show up on my cheeks. I returned it because there was no way for me to get this to work - such a waste a money if I kept it.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: The perfect colour for bronzed beauties! Love this colour for fall and it compliments my tan so nicely.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Such a beautiful soft blush. I find myself reaching for this one more often than not

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Great blush and color!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I could even fake my way through a killer hangover with this beauty. The texture is awesome, too - super smooth and sheer so you won't accidentally summon your inner drag queen.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Goes on smooth. Very subtle color. Extremely rich.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Due to my freckled complexion I have always been super hesitant about peach blushes but this is a definite keeper! Love the product itself, but the colour couldn’t be more flattering. Love it!
